title: NYT: Down with Helvetica...
content:
New York Times  
 [Down with Helvetica: Design Your Own Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628192901/http:/www.nytimes.com/2008/06/26/technology/personaltech/26basics.html?ei=5087&em=&en=ca1c8a96d3e7f3a2&ex=1214798400&adxnnl=1&adxnnlx=1214634227-f2OnEtwulatsSzU5L5zt1g)

 [‹ Poliphilus](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628192901/http:/typophile.com/node/46830 "Go to previous forum topic") [AE with acute, slashed O with acute, A with ring and acute ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080628192901/http:/typophile.com/node/46871 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: well i did search for the article’s name... you think people would provide these small details when linking elsewhere.
